trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events that render the background of objects derived from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos que renderizam a tela de fundo dos objetos derivados do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> na classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs> class provides data for the following events:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs> classe fornece dados para os seguintes eventos:

trans-unit.source: In addition, it provides data for the following methods:
trans-unit.target: Além disso, ele fornece dados para os seguintes métodos:

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A> method to draw a border around a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A> método para desenhar uma borda ao redor de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object used to draw the item.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para desenhar o item.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs" /> class for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> and using the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> especificado usando o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics used to paint the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os elementos gráficos usados para pintar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para pintar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A> method to draw a border around a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A> método para desenhar uma borda ao redor de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> a ser pintado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> a ser pintado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A> method to draw a border around a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A> método para desenhar uma borda ao redor de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner" /> property for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> a ser pintado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> that is the owner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> que é proprietário do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is in the overflow area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs.ToolStrip%2A> property returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> está na área de estouro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemRenderEventArgs.ToolStrip%2A> propriedade retorna uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A> method to draw a border around a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderButtonBackground%2A> método para desenhar uma borda ao redor de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>.
